entry.title: In the Lowlight
entry.summary:
Author: magpietendencies (writtenintostars)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,577Chapters: 4/28Kudos: 75

Summary: There’s nothing recognizable about Jason, except maybe the way he zeroes in on you the second you step into the room. He always treated you that way, like you were what he was waiting for, the only reason he even showed up. “Jason.” You say when you remember how to talk again. You’re vaguely aware that you’re digging your nails into your palms. You tell yourself to blink, your eyes beginning to water, but you can’t bring yourself to, afraid you’ll find that Jason won’t be there anymore. “Hey, Mags,” the figure greets you, and it’s the first time anyone’s called you that in years. It makes sense that it would be Jason who uses the nickname. He gave it to you, after all. ~ You and Jason Todd spent your teen years together under Batman's tutelage and Bruce Wayne's care, your bond going much further than any words can describe. Six years after his apparent death, Jason reappears, both of you angry and dejected, teeming with love you don't know what to do with. You missed each other. ~ Updates the first Monday of each month.

entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,218Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. There are two separate endings. Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 839,751Chapters: 103/?Kudos: 851

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. entry.title: Siege of Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: velvet_alchemist

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,241Chapters: 29/29Kudos: 35

Summary: “No, I came here specifically to get you. I saw what happened, I was on the way to- well, I was on the way to meet up with a friend, and-“ “Cat-woman?” She guesses before you can tell her. She’s not getting up from the table, but you think nothing of it at first. “Yes. But I’m sorry it took me so long, this place is just really confusing. I was worried I might not have been fast enough..” “That’s fine, but I don’t think you should be here. Did you let Batman know before you-“ “No. It’s just me. But I assume he’s on the way..right?” Barbara doesn’t answer you, and you have a sudden pit in your stomach as you hear that metal door sling back open.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,378Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 227

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: Luck of the Draw
entry.summary:
Author: velvet_alchemist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,173Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 42

Summary: Yet another one of my grand attempts at a Jason X Reader Whumpfic :)  Looks like you got yourself in a bind. Again. As usual. Poor Jason..won’t he be worried? At least it wasn’t the Joker, right? Ahhhh, wrong. Very, very wrong. Well, it isn’t him, but it is- “There’s no point in struggling,” Slade drawls from his place in front of the beam you’re tied to. “We won’t be here very long. Besides, I am just using you for leverage.”
